body.p: To integrate Doxygen into the Visual C++ IDE, just add it to the external tools. And refer to the config file called Doxyfile use the following documentation:
The doxygen manual is available at:
Comment style has to be changed as follows:

Current file headers:
/****************************************************************************** Project : BUSMASTER FileName : BUSMASTER.cpp Description : CBUSMASTERApp class implementation file $Log: X:/Archive/Sources/Application/CAN_Monitor.cpv $
Rev 1.18 15 Apr 2011 19:59:30 CANMNTTM Added RBEI Copyright information.
Author(s) : Amitesh Bharti Date Created : 20.02.2002 Modified By : Amitesh Bharti, Ratnadip Choudhury, Anish kumar Copyright (c) 2011, Robert Bosch Engineering and Business Solutions. All rights reserved. ******************************************************************************/

Doxygen file headers:
/** * \file BUSMASTER.cpp * \brief CBUSMASTERApp class implementation file * \author Amitesh Bharti [use author if there is only one] * \authors Amitesh Bharti, Ratnadip Choudhury, Anish kumar [use authors if there are multiple (modifiers)] * \date 20.02.2002 Created * \date 15.04.2011 Added RBEI Copyright information * \copyright Copyright (c) 2011, Robert Bosch Engineering and Business Solutions. All rights reserved. */

Doxygen function headers:
/** * \brief Brief description of function * \param[in] a Description of paramter a, if thats inbound * \param[out] a Description of paramter a, if thats outbound * \param[in,out] a Description of paramter a, if thats in- and outbound * \param a Description of paramter a, if the direction is unspecified * \return Description of return value * \author Amitesh Bharti [use author if there is only one] * \authors Amarnath Shastry,Amitesh Bharti [use authors if there are multiple (modifiers)] * \date 20.02.2002 Created * \date 30.12.2002 Amitesh Bharti, Initialise the thread structure. * \date 22.07.2004 Amitesh Bharti, Modofiction due to new DLL Unload thread * * If a long description is necessary, put it here. */ int foobar( int a )
